page.title: 17STOCKTON -- OUR TOWN
page.content: I like Stockton because it is a good town to live in. No matter where you are there will always be a shop whether a small shop selling sweets and tobacco or a larger shop selling these as well as wines and spirits etc. Stockton has a library which is very handy to find out things for schoolwork such as topics or homework. Older people go to the library to read the books while they are there rather than take the books home with them. Across the road from the library is the swimming baths which has just been modernised by putting in a leisure pool as before they only had a diving pool as well as the main swimming pool. The problem is that before the new pool was built the entrance fee was:- CHILDREN 15pence ADULTS 25pence but now it is CHILDREN 25p ADULTS 50p. {Heather Brown 15
